start.text: So the player doesn't necessarily have to enjoy the game they're playing

2.text: Fair enough, there are times when even we don't enjoy the games we're playing

3.text: So a game is still a game, and it doesn't have to be enjoyed, and it can be played for monetary gain

4.text: But, what if I put a cheesy plot twist here where the game wasn't a game?

5.text: Oh, in this game, your clicks were actually buying plots of land in an auction for investment purposes

6.text: Now that the activity has spilled out into the real world
